price: I osluškuj Dan kad će glasnik pozvati iz mjesta koje je blizu,
arabic: وَٱسۡتَمِعۡ يَوۡمَ يُنَادِ ٱلۡمُنَادِ مِن مَّكَانٖ قَرِيبٖ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wa-is'tamiʿ yawma yunādi al-munādi min makānin qarībin
